data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Christopher Koch | July 8, 2022 | Raynor & D'Andrea Funeral Homes
data.text:
Christopher John Koch, 64, a resident of Oakdale, LI for more than 25 years, died on Friday, July 8, 2022. Raised in Islip Terrace, Chris graduated from East Islip High School. He worked for more than thirty years as a technician at Xerox and over the past ten years as Business and Facilities Manager at St. Lawrence RC Church in Sayville and as Director of the parish cemetery.

Chris is survived by his father, Ron and his wife Barbara, his sister, Poppy-Anne Koch-Sato and her husband Dennis and his brother, Tony, all of California, as well as his longtime friend and neighbor, Donna Preuss of Oakdale, and Donna’s brother Donald McKenna and his wife Kathy, all of whom Chris considered an extension of his family.

Friends and relatives will gather on Tuesday, July 12th, 2-4:30 & 7-9:30 p.m. at Raynor & D’Andrea Funeral Home in West Sayville. A Funeral Mass will be celebrated on Wednesday, July 13th at 10 a.m. at St. Lawrence RC Church and interment will follow in the parish cemetery.
